title: Deals: iPad Air 5 launch discounts from $570, Apple Pencil 2 $25 off, AirPods Pro, more
content:
A new week is underway, and all of today’s best deals are following suit with the ongoing launch day iPad Air 5 discount. That’s alongside a fitting Apple Pencil 2 price cut to $104 and the refreshed AirPods Pro with MagSafe case at $74 off. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: iPad Air 5 launch discounts from $570, Apple Pencil 2 $25 off, AirPods Pro, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: iPad Air 5 discount now live at Amazon following launch day starting at $570. That's alongside a fitting Apple Pencil 2 markdown to $104.
